verbs.description: North Korea [V: has] also threatened to abandon the planned Trump - Kim meeting over the U.S. insistence on denuclearizing the Korean Peninsula .
[ARG0: North Korea] has [ARGM-ADV: also] [V: threatened] [ARG1: to abandon the planned Trump - Kim meeting over the U.S. insistence on denuclearizing the Korean Peninsula] .
[ARG0: North Korea] has also threatened to [V: abandon] [ARG1: the planned Trump - Kim meeting over the U.S. insistence on denuclearizing the Korean Peninsula] .
North Korea has also threatened to abandon the [V: planned] [ARG1: Trump - Kim meeting] over the U.S. insistence on denuclearizing the Korean Peninsula .
North Korea has also threatened to abandon the planned Trump - Kim meeting over the U.S. insistence on [V: denuclearizing] [ARG1: the Korean Peninsula] .
